metadata.Title: CVE-2021-44497 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in FIS GT.M through V7.0-000 (related to the YottaDB code base). Using crafted input, can cause the bounds of a for loop to be miscalculated, which leads to a use after free condition a pointer is pushed into previously free memory by the loop.

criterions.comment: fis-gtm package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
